name: Whiteboard App
description: The Whiteboard App is a versatile tool for creating and sharing digital sketches and drawings. It provides a canvas interface with drawing tools such as pencils, shapes, text, and colors, enabling users to express their creativity conveniently. With features like undo/redo, save/load functionality, and export options, the Whiteboard App is ideal for collaborative brainstorming sessions, educational purposes, and artistic expression.
